**This data set contains environmental parameters: Temp and Salinity, among other environmental parameters.**

# Getting Started

#### Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(ggpubr)
library(lubridate)
library(Rmisc)#For stat summary
```

#### Load Data

```{r}
here<- here::here
select<-dplyr::select
rename<- dplyr::rename
```

```{r}
d1<- read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "tx_master.csv"))
env<- read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "env", "ENV_META_REPS.csv"))
ysi<- read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "env", "ENV_META_AVG.csv"))
bac<-read_csv(here('data', 'processed_data', 'ANOVA Data', 'total_bacteria.csv'))
dust<- read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "dust", "dust_master.csv"))


```

# Cleaning

#### Daily data frame

```{r}
ysi<-
  ysi %>%
  filter(date %in% c(as.Date("2022-07-07"):as.Date("2022-07-19")))%>%
  mutate(site = recode(site, "BO" = "Blind Oso",
                       "C2" = "Canals",
                       "RD" = "Gulf")) %>%
  rename("Site" = "site")

env<-
  env %>%
  filter(date %in% c(as.Date("2022-07-07"):as.Date("2022-07-19"))) %>%
  mutate(site = recode(site, "BO" = "Blind Oso",
                       "C2" = "Canals",
                       "RD" = "Gulf")) %>%
  rename("Site" = "site")
  
daily<-
  d1 %>%
  filter(date %in% c(as.Date("2022-07-07"):as.Date("2022-07-19")),
         hr_cst %in% "01",
         !date %in% as.Date('2022-07-10')) %>%
  rename("Site" = "site")

dust<-
  dust %>%
  filter(date %in% c(as.Date("2022-07-07"):as.Date("2022-07-19"))) 

  bac<- 
    bac %>%
      rename("Site" = "site")
```

# Visualization

## YSI (1 Rep)

#### Temperature

```{r}
cbbPalette <- c("#DDAA33", "#BB5566", "#004488")
```

```{r}
temp<- 
  ysi %>% 
  ggplot() + 
 # geom_point(
 # aes(
  #  x = date,
  #  y = temp,
  #  color = Site),
 # size = 2)+
  geom_line(
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = Temperature,
    color = Site),
  size = 1)+
  theme_bw()+
  labs(
    x = "date",
    y = "Temperature (°C)",
   # title = "Daily Temperatures",
    color = "Site")+
  theme(
    plot.title= element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 15),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 13, face = "bold"),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 7),
    legend.position = "none") + #Moves legend onto plot 
    scale_color_manual(values = cbbPalette)
temp

ggsave(here("results", "plots", "env", "temp.png"))
```

## NUTRIENTS (2 Reps)

#### Nitrite:Nitrate

```{r}
nn_sum <- summarySE(env, measurevar="NO2NO3", groupvars=c("Site", "date")) 

nn<-
  ggplot(nn_sum, 
       aes(x=date, 
           y=NO2NO3, 
           color=Site)) + 
    geom_errorbar(data = nn_sum,
      aes(ymin=NO2NO3-se, 
          ymax=NO2NO3+se), 
      size = 0.5,
      width=0.3) +
    geom_line(size = 1) +
    geom_point(data = nn_sum)+
  theme_bw()+
  labs(x = "date",
       y = "NO3- + NO2- (µM)",
       color = "Site")+
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 day", date_labels = "%b %d")+
  scale_color_manual(values = cbbPalette)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
        axis.title.y = element_text(face = "bold"),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),
        legend.position = "none") 
nn
```

## BIOTIC

#### TOtal Bacteria

```{r}
bact<-
bac %>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_boxplot(
    aes(x = date,
        y = log10(copies_mL),
        color = Site,
        group = interaction(Site,date)),
    position = "identity")+
  scale_color_manual(values = cbbPalette) +
stat_summary(fun=mean, geom="line", 
             aes(x = date, 
                 y = log10(copies_mL),
                 group=Site, 
                 color = Site)) +
  theme_bw()+
  labs(x = "date",
       y = "Total Bacteria (log(copies/mL))",
       color = "Site")+
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 day", date_labels = "%b %d") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x =element_blank(),
        axis.title.y = element_text(face= "bold"),
        legend.position = "none")
bact
```
